mapper.select: SELECT reviewNum, reviewTitle ,reviewContent, reviewCreated, score, m.username, h.hotelId FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.userid=m.userid JOIN hotel h ON h.hotelId = r.hotelId WHERE reviewNum=#{reviewNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewreport(reviewNum, reportContent, hotelId) VALUES(#{reviewNum}, #{reportContent}, #{hotelId})
mapper.select: SELECT h.hotelId, hotelName, roomName FROM reservation res JOIN reserdetail rd ON rd.reservationNum=res.reservationnum JOIN room r ON r.roomnum=rd.roomnum JOIN hotel h ON h.hotelId=r.hotelId WHERE res.reservationNum=#{reservationNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET reviewTitle=#{reviewTitle} , reviewContent=#{reviewContent} WHERE reviewNum=#{reviewNum} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT replyNum, reviewNum, userId, replyContent, replyCreated FROM reply WHERE reviewNum=#{reviewNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(replyNum, reviewNum, userId, replyContent) VALUES (reply_seq.nextval, #{reviewNum}, #{userId}, #{replyContent})
